title: UCONN Huskies Players Suspected of Using Skill Enhancing Drugs Prior to Championship Game
subtitle: Is the NCAA investigating the use of 'skill enhancing drugs' by the 2014 champion UConn Huskies men's basketball  team?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The NCAA is investigating the use of “skill enhancing drugs” by the 2014 champion UConn Huskies men’s basketball team.
